#include<stdio.h>
#define max 2147483647
 
inline void inp( int &n )
{
    n=0;
    int ch=getchar();int sign=1;
    while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=getchar();}
 
    while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
     n = (n*10) + ch-'0', ch=getchar();
     n=n*sign;
}
 
 
int a[101][101];
 
int main()
{
 int t;
inp(t);
 while(t--)
 {
 
  int m,n,i,j,x=0,y=0,steps=0;
  inp(m);inp(n);
 
        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
  for(j=0;j<n;j++)
  inp(a[i][j]);
 
  for(i=0;i<m;i++)
  a[i][n]=max;
 
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        a[m][j]=max;
 
  while(a[x+1][y]!=max || a[x][y+1]!=max)
  {
   steps++;
   
   if(a[x+1][y] > a[x][y+1])
   {
 
    a[x][y] = a[x][++y];
 
            }
   else
   {
 
    a[x][y] = a[++x][y];
 
            }
  }
  printf("%d\n",steps);
 }
 return 0;
}
